recommendations: “I have no hesitation in saying that in her chosen career, Amita is second to none. However, more importantly, what makes Amita who she is, as a human being and therefore as a professional, is her grit, determination and courage, and her self awareness. These make her too the quintessential ambassador for equality and inclusion and a powerful voice in that space. I know also that she is wonderfully empathetic, and that is such a significant piece of what makes for good teamwork and great leadership.” Show less

volunteer_experience.info: I presently Co-Chair the Citi India Pride Network whilst also working for Wealth Technology and feel truly honored to be able to drive Citi's vision of Inclusion forward especially for the LGBTI+ community.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Citi India Pride Network
volunteer_experience.title: Co-Chair

volunteer_experience.info: My journey is a riveting, emotional, and a revolutionary act of defining dreams, determination, and hopes in my life.The genesis of my Pro Bono advocacy engagements is my metamorphosis. Through my advocacy I help humans see humans by breaking their cocoons which could be filled with stereotypes, biases and prejudices.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: 50+ esteemed organisations
volunteer_experience.title: Diversity, Equity and Inclusion advocate

volunteer_experience.info: I am described as a Change Agent and through my advocacy on prestigious platforms such as TedX, NASSCOM, SHRM and many others, I hope that it will lead not just individual changes in terms of behaviors and attitudes but can also lay the foundation of the systemic changes that need to happen in the society.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: NASSCOM, SHRM, HR Infotetch, Out & Equal
volunteer_experience.title: Public Speaker - Diversity, Equity and Inclusion

volunteer_experience.info: I am humbled that I could lead Barclays' Spectrum Network whilst working for Barclays technology. Through this network I along with the team could work on the various aspects of Legal rights and protection of the LGBTQIA+ colleagues at the workplace and bolster the vision of inclusion and belongingness.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Barclays Spectrum
volunteer_experience.title: Lead
